Text: Get yourself a DHT-complient and superseed-complient client. Like Azureus or uTorrent.

Now was it smart to put all of that up there, probaly not, but if the movie chumps can harass me, why not anyone else that wants to...I know it's not very hard to backtrack, but I find it interesting that someone took the time to send  out a notice to little old me about such an old movie that I may or may not have purchased 1-5 time throughout the years.  is it my fault shit doesn't stand up to the test of time? I mean, how many time am I supposed to buy the shit?  Buy a thing to own it...not own it for a little while, you greedy whoremongers.
